Hymn.Arabic: أرسل خلاصا لشعبه  , أمر بعهده إلى الأبد ,
Hymn.English: 9 He has sent redemption to His people; He has commanded His covenant forever: Holy and awesome is His name.

Hymn.Arabic: إسمه قدوس ومرهوب , رأس الحكمة خوف الرب . الليلويا
Hymn.English: 10 The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom.     Alleluia
